content:
<rule id="integration-00017" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
        <when>
            <javaclass references="org.springframework.integration.dsl.IntegrationFlow">
                <location>IMPORT</location>
            </javaclass>
        </when>
        <perform>
            <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - Spring Integration">
                <description>The application embeds the Spring Integration framework.</description>
            </classification>
            <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Spring Integration</technology-tag>
        </perform>
      </rule>
